
{{Server event}}
This event is triggered when a player stands on a different element than before.

==Parameters==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
element previousElement, element currentElement
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''previousElement''': The [[/element.md|element]] player was standing on before. ''nil'' if none.
*'''currentElement''': The new [[/element.md|element]] that the player is standing on now. ''nil'' if none.

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/player.md|player]] who hit an element.

==Example== 
This example outputs the element type of an element you have hit
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function outputElementType ( prev, current )
	if ( current ) then
		outputChatBox ( "You have hit an "..getElementType ( current ) )
	end
end
addEventHandler ( "onPlayerContact", getRootElement(), outputElementType )
</syntaxhighlight>
